cc:Work.dc:title: Comparison of 1962 US standard atmosphere graph with altitudes of various objects

svg.title: Comparison of 1962 US standard atmosphere graph with altitudes of various objects
svg.desc: Comparison of the 1962 US standard atmosphere graph of geometric altitude against density, pressure, the speed of sound and temperature with approximate altitudes of various objects, by CMG Lee. Data is based on graph at http://www.centennialofflight.gov/essay/Theories_of_Flight/atmosphere/TH1G1.htm .
